hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, TABLE_NAME, DATA_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, DATA_LENGTH, DEFAULT_VALUE, FK_TABLE_COLUMN, TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, KEY_TYPE, NULLABLE, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') AS UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID FROM ZEBRA_COLUMN_CREATION_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 ${auto_fill} ${frameworkGeneratedWhere} ${frameworkGeneratedOrderBy} FOR UPDATE

INSERT INTO ZEBRA_COLUMN_CREATION_INFO ( COLUMN_NAME, TABLE_NAME, DATA_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, DATA_LENGTH, DEFAULT_VALUE, FK_TABLE_COLUMN, INSERT_DATE, INSERT_USER_ID, KEY_TYPE, NULLABLE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER_ID ) VALUES ( ${COLUMN_NAME}, ${TABLE_NAME}, ${DATA_TYPE}, ${DESCRIPTION}, ${DATA_LENGTH}, ${DEFAULT_VALUE}, ${FK_TABLE_COLUMN}, ${INSERT_DATE}, ${INSERT_USER_ID}, ${KEY_TYPE}, ${NULLABLE}, ${UPDATE_DATE}, ${UPDATE_USER_ID} )

UPDATE ZEBRA_COLUMN_CREATION_INFO SET DATA_TYPE = ${DATA_TYPE}, DESCRIPTION = ${DESCRIPTION}, DATA_LENGTH = ${DATA_LENGTH}, DEFAULT_VALUE = ${DEFAULT_VALUE}, FK_TABLE_COLUMN = ${FK_TABLE_COLUMN}, INSERT_DATE = ${INSERT_DATE}, INSERT_USER_ID = ${INSERT_USER_ID}, KEY_TYPE = ${KEY_TYPE}, NULLABLE = ${NULLABLE}, UPDATE_DATE = ${UPDATE_DATE}, UPDATE_USER_ID = ${UPDATE_USER_ID} WHERE 1 = 1 ${frameworkGeneratedWhere}
